https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8MRSywCkGdqMPbGE3CDFREwbdo.jpg Four twentysomethings find themselves stuck on a haunted antique bed where leaving means suffering a gruesome death. Plagued with frightening hallucinations, they must figure out the bed's secrets before they are ultimately picked off one by one. Bed of the Dead
